title: Al Kharid Rooftop Course

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Al Kharid Rooftop Agility Course is available to players with an Agility level of 20 or higher. It is preceded by the Draynor Village Rooftop Course and followed by the Varrock Rooftop Course.

content:
Al Kharid Rooftop Course
Released5 December 2013 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationAl Kharid (Kharidian Desert)
Map
Advanced data
Typeagility course

The Al Kharid Rooftop Agility Course is available to players with an Agility level of 20 or higher. It is preceded by the Draynor Village Rooftop Course and followed by the Varrock Rooftop Course.

The Al Kharid Rooftop Agility course can be started by climbing the Rough Wall on the north side of Ellis the Tanner's building and is finished by jumping off a building east of the scimitar shop. Players get 180 experience points from completing the course, which is more evenly spread throughout the course, unlike other agility courses.

It is possible to fail the Cross Tightrope 1 and Teeth-grip Zip Line obstacles during the course, taking 1-5 damage each time.

A player can complete this course in 64.8 seconds (108 ticks). Using this course, one can reach approximately 9,850 XP per hour.

Image Obstacle Failable Experience
Rough wall No 10
Tightrope 1 Yes 30
Cable No 40
Zip line Yes 40
Tropical tree Yes 10
Roof top beams No 5
Tightrope 2 No 15
Gap No 30
Total 180
